context: Bone Grafting for Dental Implants,implant removal,
review: ****** ***** ** * ****** ************** ****** ******* *** **** ** ***** ******* I have not seen such a nice doctor even in other medical fields. He spends lot of time with patients in explaining all the details and fills confidence. I lost my dental bone and suffered a lot of pain due to terrible mistake done by one of the top most doctor in Pune, this East Street Pune doctor put local made 32 mm hieght implants in my mouth for high cost (25k for each implant) though there was not enough bone there, and they had to be extracted due to less bone and other complications. Luckily I found doctor Vakil, he has been treating me for some time and I am very happy with him. He follows evidence based treatment that gave me a lot of confidence. My treatment will go for some time and I am sure I will be happy with the outcome.
